general-insults.insult: You fight like a Dairy Farmer!
general-insults.comeback: How appropriate! You fight like a cow!

general-insults.insult: This is the END for you, you gutter crawling cur!
general-insults.comeback: And I've got a little TIP for you, get the POINT?

general-insults.insult: I've spoken with apes more polite than you!
general-insults.comeback: I'm glad to hear you attended your family reunion!

general-insults.insult: Soon you'll be wearing my sword like a shish kebab!
general-insults.comeback: First you better stop waving it about like a feather duster.

general-insults.insult: People fall at my feet when they see me coming!
general-insults.comeback: Even BEFORE they smell your breath?

general-insults.insult: I'm not going to take your insolence sitting down!
general-insults.comeback: Your hemorroids are flaring up again eh?

general-insults.insult: I once owned a dog that was smarter than you.
general-insults.comeback: He must have taught you everything you know.

general-insults.insult: Nobody's ever drawn blood from me and nobody ever will.
Have you stopped wearing diapers yet?
general-insults.comeback: Why? Did you want to borrow one?

general-insults.insult: There are no words for how disgusting you are.
general-insults.comeback: Yes there are. You just never learned them.

general-insults.insult: You make me want to puke.
general-insults.comeback: You make me think somebody already did.

general-insults.insult: My handkerchief will wipe up your blood!
general-insults.comeback: So you got that job as janitor, after all.

general-insults.insult: I got this scar on my face during a mighty struggle!
general-insults.comeback: I hope now you've learned to stop picking your nose.

general-insults.insult: I've heard you are a contemptible sneak.
general-insults.comeback: Too bad no one's ever heard of YOU at all.

general-insults.insult: You're no match for my brains, you poor fool.
general-insults.comeback: I'd be in real trouble if you ever used them.

general-insults.insult: You have the manners of a beggar.
general-insults.comeback: I wanted to make sure you'd feel comfortable with me.
